name: @eversports/pyro-form
description: Pyro-Form is a fast and simple form manager for react that helps you with managing your components data in a form.

scripts.precommit: yarn build && git add dist && lint-staged
scripts.publish-patch: git pull origin master && yarn publish --patch && git push origin master --tags
scripts.publish-minor: git pull origin master && yarn publish --minor && git push origin master --tags
scripts.publish-major: git pull origin master && yarn publish --major && git push origin master --tags
